Episodes.Title: Olympic Forest
Episodes.Plot: Peter visits two stunning, coastal National Parks in the northwest to bring back the perfect shot.

Episodes.Plot: Peter returns to Hawaii, hoping to tame one of the rainiest places on Earth, all in a quest to capture that illusive perfect shot.

Episodes.Title: Northern Exposure

Episodes.Title: Grand Canyon
Episodes.Plot: Dizzying heights for the perfect shot.

Episodes.Title: Capture the Gods
Episodes.Plot: Meet Peter Lik, master photographer. In this episode, Peter ventures from the lush valleys to the highest peaks of Hawaii to capture three of The Big Island's gods and goddesses on film.

Episodes.Title: Desert Extremes
Episodes.Plot: Heat blasts Peter as he climbs sand dunes to capture some of the most beautiful landscapes the Mojave Desert has to offer.

Episodes.Title: Hidden Canyons
Episodes.Plot: Peter ventures through the red rock canyons of the American Southwest in a quest to recapture its elusive beauty.

Episodes.Title: Arch Hunting
Episodes.Plot: Generations have been astounded by the natural rock arches in Utah. Peter attempts to capture their beauty in this episode of "From the Edge."

Episodes.Title: Winter Extremes
Episodes.Plot: Peter Lik brings his unique perspective to "Big Sky Country." His challenge is to capture this beautiful landscape in the heart of winter.

Episodes.Title: Yosemite
Episodes.Plot: Peter's epic quest brings him to one of America's grandest parks - Yosemite. But this photographer's Mecca won't be a walk in the park.
